<[[https://www.honeywellaidc.com/pages/SiteLanguages.aspx]]> Direct-To | June 2016 Pilot Gateway Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2016/MyHangar]]>
My Hangar
Honeywell Pilot Gateway users can now save multiple aircraft types to their profile using the new My Hangar enhancement... NavDB Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2016/NavDBNotices]]>
Navigation Database Notices
It is important that pilots receive copies of Navigation Database notices, as most of them include pertinent information on navigation databases for the current AIRAC cycle... Flight Technical Services Q&A <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2016/SAIBUpdate]]>
Update on 'Advisory Vertical Guidance with No Published Vertical Descent Angle' SAIB
An update on the change implemented by the FAA regarding Instrument Approach Procedures in the United States that are published without a vertical descent angle... Surveillance News <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2016/Whereistheaircraft]]>
Where is the Aircraft?
What if one surveillance technology could provide better coverage and accuracy at a lower cost, using existing aircraft avionics? Tools of the Trade <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2016/PEAF]]>
Primus™ Elite Advanced Features The soon-to-be available Advanced Features option for Primus™ Elite affords the operator the latest in Electronic safety and avionics design enhancements...
